alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:30AM EDT until April 08 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Tucsawhatchee Creek near Hawkinsville affecting Pulaski County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Tucsawhatchee Creek near Hawkinsville. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 11 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding of woodlands, fields and pastures begin upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highways 257 and 27. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM EDT Friday the stage was 11.3 feet. - Forecast...The creek is expected to crest at 11.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
